qas.question: In how many FIFA world cups has England appeared?
Besides France, which other team is tied with England for number of appearances in the FIFA World Cup?
In which year did England win the FIFA World Cup for the first and only time?
In what place did England finish in the 1990 FIFA World Cup?
Which country hosted the 1990 FIFA World Cup?
How many FIFA World Cups has France been in?
In what year was Spain's first World Cup appearance?
Where was the 2002 World Cup held?
Where was the 1950 FIFA World Cup held?

context: England first appeared at the <b6_0>1950<b6_0/> FIFA World Cup and have appeared in <a0_0><b5_0>14<b5_0/><a0_0/> FIFA World Cups, they are tied for sixth-best in terms of number of wins alongside France and <a1_0>Spain<a1_0/>. The national team is one of eight national teams to have won at least one FIFA World Cup title. The England team won their first and only World Cup title in <a2_0>1966<a2_0/>. The tournament was played on home soil and England defeated <b7_0>Germany<b7_0/> 4–2 in the final. In 1990, <b9_0>England<b9_0/> finished in <a3_0>fourth<a3_0/> place, losing 2–1 to host nation <a4_0><b8_0>Italy<b8_0/><a4_0/> in the third place play-off after losing on penalties to champions Germany in the semi-final. The team has also reached the quarter-final on two recent occasions in 2002 and 2006. Previously, they reached this stage in 1954, 1962, 1970 and 1986.
